data.name: Unity of Command II Soundtrack Vol.2
data.detailed_description: The Unity of Command II Soundtrack Vol.2 features music composed exclusively for the Blitzkrieg, Barbarossa, and Stalingrad DLC. Additionally, it contains remastered music tracks from Unity of Command (2011). Music by Bruno Babić.
data.about_the_game: The Unity of Command II Soundtrack Vol.2 features music composed exclusively for the Blitzkrieg, Barbarossa, and Stalingrad DLC. Additionally, it contains remastered music tracks from Unity of Command (2011). Music by Bruno Babić.
data.short_description: The Unity of Command II Soundtrack Vol.2 features music composed exclusively for the Blitzkrieg, Barbarossa, and Stalingrad DLC. Additionally, it contains remastered music tracks from Unity of Command (2011). Music by Bruno Babić.
